description: Internal and external alterations to the buildings including a new pitched roof extension at 13 Welbeck Street, a new lightwell at lower ground floor level of 14 Welbeck Street, new rear ground floor terrace to 13 Welbeck Street and installation of plant in the front pavement vaults, at main roof level and rear first floor level.
